message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It is an exceptional opportunity that I believe will greatly benefit your business. I am offering it to you for $1,500,000. This is a special introductory price, considering the value it will bring to your company.
Dear Alice, thank you for presenting your product. While I believe it has potential, the asking price is a bit too high for me. I would be willing to offer $800,000 to start negotiations.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but we need to maintain the value of our product in the market. I am proposing to reconsider the price at $950,000 for this unique opportunity.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $950,000 is still a significant investment. I'm prepared to increase my offer to $875,000. I believe this represents a fair compromise.

Bob, I understand your position and I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial agreement. Considering the value of our product and its potential impact on your business, I am willing to consider $900,000 as the final offer.
